akn:section.akn:heading: Rural emergency medical service training and equipment assistance program

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Grants The Secretary, acting through the Assistant Secretary, shall award grants to eligible entities to enable such entities to provide for improved emergency medical services in rural areas or to residents of rural areas.
